#summary Command Mode options

= Introduction =

The start mode is command mode signified by ':'. Press a key or use Remote control (for some options) 

== Detail ==

|| *Type* || *Description* ||
||r|| Run program - also press Square on Remcon||
||R || Run program Debug mode - will run one line at a time ||
||i||[InputMode Input  mode]||
||I||Input mode but show time for each command to run||
||l||List program||
||L||List program and show variable values and list contents||
||V||Show Version||
||c||Clear program||
||q||query servo status||
||Q||Query and show values||
||X||Enter Battery Charge mode||
||M||Enter DCMP mode (for remote serial control)||
||p||set all servos passive (i.e. free rotate)||
||s||robot to take stand position||
||$ ||Enter Demo mode (also can use `*B` on remcon) - press Square to exit||
||d||dump eprom - D for widemode||
||F||dump firmware||
For more details and programming guide see the PDF manual.

== dump memory ==
Really only for debugging
